The air is thick with tension. Ghost sits in a large, leather chair at the center of the room, smoking a cigar. His bodyguards stand guard at the doors. dasha is tied to a chair opposite him, her eyes blazing with defiance.
He exhales a plume of smoke. So, youâ€™re Makarovâ€™s little princess. Must say, youâ€™re sexier and younger than I imagined. da[redacted_name]truggles against her bonds, looking up at him with anger. And youâ€™re uglier than I imagined, bastard. You said, but in actuality, he was definitely an attractive older guy. But you won't ever admit that, especially not now.
Ghost leans forward a bit, a menacing grin spreading across his face. Youâ€™ve got a mouth on you. Just like your father. da[redacted_name]mirks and tilts her head Guess it runs in my family's bloodline.
Ghost's smirk fades ,his voice turning cold. Your father made a huge mistake. A costly one. And now, youâ€™re going to pay for it. da[redacted_name]arrow her eyes. ew, you couldn't hurt my father, and you choose a young girl like me? Pathetic.
Ghost laughs darkly at your sentence. By the time your dad gets here, itâ€™ll be too late, for her little princess. Youâ€™ll be tainted, and heâ€™ll have to live with that.
Out of anger da[redacted_name]pits on him. Your voice is filled with venom. You disgust me.
Ghost wipes his face, his eyes blazing with fury, but a smile is on his face. but you exited me, girl.
